predicate.note: Frames file for 'rank' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet entries 29.2 29.6, other framed members include count, define, describe, employ, intend, portray, redefine, regard, treat. Comparison with define.

roleset.name: assign a position in a list

example.name: all args
example.text: Nearly 36% ranked housing problems as their most serious unmet legal need.
example.arg: their most serious unmet legal need

example.name: ergative
example.text: Nekoosa ranked 11th with sales of $3.59 billion.

example.name: multiple rankings
example.text: Based on 1988 sales, Georgia-Pacific ranked third at $9.51 billion, behind Weyerhaeuser Co. at $10 billion and International Paper Co. at $9.53 billion.
example.arg: behind Weyerhaeuser Co. at $10 billion and International Paper Co. at $9.53 billion

roleset.note: All the Arg2's in the last example are equivalent, so all need to be marked as arg2's. They should not be merged into a single argument.
